titles.title: All The Way My Savior Leads Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All the way my Savior leads me What have I to ask beside Can I doubt His tender mercy Who thro' life has been my Guide Heav'nly peace Divinest comfort Here by faith in Him to dwell{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For I know whate'er befall me Jesus doeth all things well For I know whate'er befall me Jesus doeth all things well All the way my Savior leads me Cheers each winding Path I tread Gives me grace for every trial Feeds me with the living bread Tho' my weary steps may falter And my soul athirst may be Gushing from The Rock before me Lo a spring of joy I see Gushing from The Rock before me Lo a spring of joy I see{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All the way my Savior leads me O the fullness of His love Perfect rest to me is promised In my Father's house above When my spirit Clothed immortal Wings its flight To realms of day This my song Thro' endless ages Jesus led me all the way This my song Thro' endless ages Jesus led me all the way{/lang-eng}
